author: Gareth Porter
title: How Generals Fueled 1918 Flu Pandemic to Win Their World War
description: Just like today, brass and bureaucrats ignored warnings, and sent troops overseas despite the consequences. The post How Generals Fueled 1918 Flu Pandemic to Win Their World War appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Just like today, brass and bureaucrats ignored warnings, and sent troops overseas despite the consequences.The U.S. military has been forced by the coronavirus pandemic to make some serious changes in their operations. But the Pentagon, and especially the Nav… [+8115 chars]
